title: PBE this account is currently disabled please contact player support for account recovery help me
body:
hi can i have help with my PBE account? i cant login launcher say this "this account is currently disabled please contact player support for account recovery" 
my username is : **[REDACTED]**
summoner name is: ZeKo on PBE

and one more question no for pbe
why i dont have icon from s4 i have from s5 and s6 icons from more than 2 sesons ago remove?
thanks for help good bye

replies.body:
We can't assist with account recoveries here on the Boards, but if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), a specialist will be happy to assist you with your account and any questions regarding it.

Let me know if you run into any issue submitting your ticket.
